messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

cannot submit time card cannot submit card good morning would like ask for your cannot submit card for last week friday when tried save card received multiple times message someone editing card after message when got back card extra empty lines were added card today card saved but when pressing next loading loading until after minutes get message below can you please check when problem maybe you able submit card thank you measurements sent monday november please action submit your cards for approval dear you receiving because you have cards haven submitted for approval please note enough only enter your but also make you submit your for approval take corrective actions case your submitted card gets rejected below breakdown your submitted cards please submit for approval your accordingly possible country submitted cards card status saved total submitted cards submitted cards statuses explained error usually happens when you log calendar view for period longer than days then delete one entry causes timecard switch error fix you should add back for deleted or delete entire timecard using right hand side menu recreate again rejected card was rejected by one approvers please correct card entries accordingly resubmit entered status timecard when only one or few days entire timecard have entered saved cards status passed entered validation but gone next submission step for any card issues you can resolve please wait but raise corresponding incident through portal for resolutions

message.reasoning:
**Pinpointing the Core Issue**

I'm now zeroing in on the crux of the IT ticket. I'm carefully analyzing the provided text to pinpoint the central problem and then categorize it. My focus is on effectively mapping the identified issue to the most fitting category from the defined list: "Hardware|HR Support|Access|Miscellaneous|Storage|Purchase|Internal Project|Administrative rights".


**Focusing on Categorization**

I've been analyzing the text and I think the main issue is related to submitting time cards for approval, which clearly falls under HR processes. There's nothing physical or particularly related to access. It's really about the function of submitting the time card and the issues related to that process. "HR Support" seems like the most fitting category for these problems, rather than miscellaneous, as this seems quite specific.


**Narrowing Down the Problem**

I've been going through the text, and the main issue seems to be the repeated rejections of submitted time cards and difficulties with their submission process. I'm carefully trying to interpret the different error messages and reported behaviors to determine the underlying technical or procedural glitch. The text implies a core problem is an HR-related system malfunction.
